DOC.brief_summary: In a randomized, double-blind trial, BMD of the operated proximal femur after total hip replacement measured by dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry (DXA) were compared for up to two years in patients receiving IV ZOL 5 mg infusion (n = 27) or placebo (IV saline infusion; n = 24) at two weeks and one year after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Zoledronic Acid on Femoral Bone Loss Following Total Hip Arthroplasty
